DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the efficacy and safety of the addition of intravaginal isosorbide mononitrate to an established protocol of oral misoprostol for cervical ripening and labor induction.
DOC.brief_title: Trial of Cervical Ripening and Labor Induction Using Misoprostol With or Without Intravaginal Isosorbide Mononitrate
DOC.criteria: : Pregnant women 18 years of age or greater Singleton pregnancy between 3242 weeks gestation requiring labor induction Membranes must be intact Ruptured membranes Gestational age less than 32 weeks Nonreassuring fetal heart rate tracing
